titleStmt.title: Musik til Adam Oehlenschlägers skuespil "Sanct Hansaftenspil"

work.title: Musik til Adam Oehlenschlägers skuespil "Sanct Hansaftenspil"
Music for Adam Oehlenschläger's 'Midsummer Eve Play'
Musik til Adam Oehlenschlägers skuespil "Sankt Hansaftenspil"

history.p: Nielsen composed the music for Oehlenschläger's play in great haste in May 1913. According to his own account, he only had fourteen days to do the work.

event.desc: Performance of two excerpts from the play.

incipText.p: I Skyggen vi vanke, blandt lysgrønne Straa
Saa langsomt i Sandet vi glide afsted
Tryllende Harmoni i Midnats dunkle Jord!
Her har jeg staaet i hundrede Aar

relation.label: Arrangements not by Nielsen: See Appendix

titleStmt.title: Instrumental and vocal parts, manuscript copy (Nos. 1, 7)
